DOC.brief_title: Clinical Results Bisphosphonate Denosumab Therapy Following Teriparatide Therapy Japanese
DOC.detailed_description: Registry criterion : Patients treat investigator hospital use teriparatide . Enrolled patient severe osteoporosis ; two previous osteoporotic fracture , low BMD ( < young adult mean 65 % ) . Interventions : blood analyse dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) every 4 month Informed consent : Written inform consent obtain . Sample size : Five-hundreds participant
DOC.criteria: severe osteoporotic patient cancer , hypercalcemia , etc ( i.e . patient could use bisphosphonate , denosmab , teriparatide )
